mapper.update:
update member_product_effect
member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eating_time = #{eatingTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_last_num = #{productLastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
due_date = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
taking_state = #{takingState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taking_effect = #{takingEffect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_count = #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_use_num = #{oneUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_to_times = #{oneToTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update member_product_effect set member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eating_time = #{eatingTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_last_num = #{productLastNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, due_date = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, taking_state = #{takingState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taking_effect = #{takingEffect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_count = #{productCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, one_use_num = #{oneUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, one_to_times = #{oneToTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update member_product_effect set product_last_num = (CASE when (product_last_num - eating_time) > 0 THEN (product_last_num - eating_time) else 0 end), taking_state = (CASE when product_last_num <= 0 THEN 2 end), updator='SYSTEM', upate_time = NOW() where id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select member_card memberCard, order_no orderNo, product_code productCode, product_name productName, eating_time eatingTime, product_last_num productLastNum, due_date dueDate, taking_state takingState, taking_effect takingEffect, product_count productCount, one_use_num oneUseNum, one_to_times oneToTimes from member_product_effect where member_card in
#{item}

select member_card memberCard, product_code productCode, eating_time eatingTime, product_last_num productLastNum, due_date dueDate, one_use_num oneUseNum, one_to_times oneToTimes from member_product_effect where product_last_num > 0

SELECT id id, member_card memberCard, order_no orderNo, product_code productCode, product_name productName, eating_time eatingTime, product_last_num productLastNum, due_date dueDate, taking_state takingState, taking_effect takingEffect, product_count productCount, one_use_num oneUseNum, one_to_times oneToTimes FROM member_product_effect WHERE product_last_num > 0
ORDER BY id
